mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, order_id, shop_prod_id, prod_name, prod_unit_price, prod_num, prod_price, prod_sku_id, prod_sku_name, shop_prod_spec_id, prod_spec_name,prod_img,commission,package_fee
mapper.select: select op.id orderProductId, op.prod_name prodName, op.prod_sku_name prodSkuName, op.prod_spec_name prodSpecName, op.prod_num prodNum, sp.product_img productImg, op.prod_price prodPrice from qingshi.order_product op left join qingshi.shop_product sp on sp.id = op.shop_prod_id where op.del_flag = 0 and op.order_id = #{orderId}

select op.id order_product_id, op.order_id op_order_id, op.shop_prod_id, op.prod_name, op.prod_unit_price, op.prod_num, op.prod_price, op.prod_img, op.commission, op.dish_id, op.unit, ops.id order_product_spec_id, ops.order_id ops_order_id, ops.order_prod_id, ops.prod_sku_name, ops.prod_sku_id, ops.prod_spec_name, ops.shop_prod_spec_id from qingshi.order_product op left join order_product_spec ops on op.id = ops.order_prod_id where op.order_id = #{orderId} and op.del_flag = 0

SELECT sp.id, sp.kry_shop_id, sp.prod_id , sp.dish_code , sp.unit_id , sp.unit , sp.dish_type , sp.product_name , sp.product_img , sp.product_desc , op.id as orderProductId, op.order_id , op.prod_unit_price , op.prod_num , op.prod_price , op.package_fee, (CASE sp.dish_type WHEN 'COMBO' THEN kcgd.dish_sku_id ELSE sps.kry_sku_id END ) kry_sku_id, (CASE sp.dish_type WHEN 'COMBO' THEN NULL ELSE sps.sku_code END ) sku_code, (CASE sp.dish_type WHEN 'COMBO' THEN kcgd.dish_name ELSE sps.sku_name END ) sku_name FROM order_product op LEFT JOIN shop_product sp ON op.shop_prod_id = sp.id AND sp.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN order_product_spec ops ON ops.order_id = op.order_id AND ops.order_prod_id = op.id AND ops.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN shop_product_spec sps ON sps.id = ops.shop_prod_spec_id AND (sps.cooking_way_id = '' OR sps.cooking_way_id IS NULL) AND sps.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN kry_combo_group_detail kcgd ON kcgd.id = ops.shop_prod_spec_id AND kcgd.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN kry_combo_group kcg ON kcg.id = kcgd.combo_group_id WHERE op.order_id = #{orderId} AND (sps.kry_sku_id IS NOT NULL OR kcg.kry_sku_id IS NOT NULL)
